Package Entity

Class Seat

java.lang.Object
Entity.Seat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Seat extends Object implements Serializable
Entity Class representing a Particular Seat in a ShowSchedule includes methods to print the layout of EACH seat, be it normal seats or couple seats
Since:
2022-10-25
Version:
1.0
